chapter.title: Introduction to the CryptNET Keyserver
chapter.para: The CryptNET Keyserver is an software system designed to provide key service. It will allow you to store and retrieve keys. CKS is a robust solution which can be implemented to provide keyservice for a single group or corporation or it can be used to provide keyservice to the entire world. CKS is capable of joining the globally synchronizing PGP PKS Keyserver network which is used by millions of individuals everyday.

chapter.title: The Multiple Keyserver Interfaces
chapter.para: There are multiple interfaces available to you which will allow you to retrieve and modify keys in a fast and efficient manner. These interfaces, or access methods are, the PKS protocol, the servers CGI Web Server, and electronic mail.
